description:
Can't get to the beach? Bring The Beach to you! 

Isn't it about time you could visit the beach from your office, home, or when running that errand you'd really rather not? The Beach experience is for you! Curl your toes in the sand, dig for sea shells, collect them, or just draw in the sand while listening to our original music.

★★★★★ "Get it, fun doodle canvas, lives up to the claims." 
★★★★★ "It's a great app for kids to doodle in. A job!" 

Features include: 
- Original beach music by renowned composer, Keith Zizza 
- Stick and hand tools for sand drawing 
- Magnet tool to pull sand together for fine detail drawing 
- Pickup and collect shells that have been brushed off 
- Become the Ultimate Collector! 

Purchase this app today, and enjoy your visit to The Beach!
versionNote: Updated sound engine to work with latest operating system update from HP.
